save_pdf

Source: R/methods.R
save_pdf-InputHeatmap-method.Rd

save_pdf

# S4 method for class 'InputHeatmap'
save_pdf(
  .heatmap,
  filename,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  units = c("in", "cm", "mm")
)

Arguments

.heatmap

A `Heatmap`

filename

A character string. The name of the output file/path

width

A `double`. Plot width

height

A `double`. Plot height

units

A character string. units ("in", "cm", or "mm")
